extendedInfo.description: Free version of awesome racing and arcade game remaining such famous titles as GTA, Carmageddon, Test Drive and Street Rod series. Trading, global leaderboards, over 25 upgradable cars, 20 different missions, unique gameplay, awesome graphics and fabulous soundtrack. Try ski jumping, taxi driving, destroying enemies using weapons! Cardboard Cars & Guns! Free game of the 2011.------IMPORTANT! FOR ANDROID 3.X (i.e. galaxy tab 10.1) If you have problems with running the game, when application shows splash screen, press home key then run the game again it should work. Let us know if you face any problems.---version 1.5: - 2 new cars: Honeybee and The Hystery Machine, import/export of game save, new start screenVersion 1.4 - new camera modes, new gui, performance updates, bug fixesVersion 1.31 - new car - Garbage Truck, 2 new tracksVersion 1.3 - 2 new cars (Santa Car & Goldley), 2 new tracks,enemies now use weapons! Better AI for enemies!Version 1.2 - bug fixes, new Admob SDK, lowered in-race GUIVersion 1.15 - 2 new cars (Ghosthunter & Cool Car Of Death) and 3 new Halloween missionsVersion 1.142 - 2 new missionsVersion 1.14 - 2 new cars (The A-Van & Truck) + 1 new mission - jump over carsVersion 1.13 - 2 new cars (Batcar'89 & De Future Car) and new 1 trackVersion 1.12 - Restart race button addedVersion 1.11 - Bug fixes.Version 1.1 - Killing zombies & 3 new missions!---

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: The cardboard style graphics make for a wonderful gaming experience. The controls are a bit tough but I won\'t complain. I\'m enjoying the game.
reviews.author: Soumyajit Pal

reviews.title: This game is really good
reviews.comment: Good game      BEST GAME EVER              ?                        Good game It, s awsome
reviews.author: Alisha Smith

reviews.title: Cars and gun 3D Free
reviews.comment: Awesome. One of the best games ive ever played !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! .So cool. Tons of fun. Like death race but using paper cars. But still awesome.
reviews.author: Johnnie Austin Jr

reviews.title: Quality game
reviews.comment: Graphics suck, but good quality game. Needs less ads.
reviews.author: Bill Johnson

reviews.title: Easy and fun
reviews.comment: Its an awesome game. The fact that it isnt a heavy game and has cool features makes it a five star app. Thank you!!
reviews.author: Wali Aleem

reviews.comment: It stinks all it does is pop up ads while I am racing. It was until that happened so I uninstalled you should too
reviews.author: Glelia Lippincott

reviews.title: Spam
reviews.comment: This game is Fun and entertaining. I like the controls and all the game play is good but, all of the adds clutter up the game and there are so many of them they cause the game to malfunction and the game shuts down on me.
reviews.author: Zack Bowerman

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: This game was perfect how it was! I can understand the adds but the music cuts out and the adds can get annoying. Hopefully corrected in the future. Otherwise I love this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
reviews.comment: i didnt even get time to play the game as adverts pop up every 2 seconds (and im not egsadurating) .....would be a good game with no adverts !!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Jake Jackson

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Sooo cool......bt little bit short...pls add more mission.... :) gud work guys....thumbs up....for game
reviews.author: Suraj Pande

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game, and i understand that to remove adds you need to pay 77p, but there are so many, the adds piled up so much my phone froze, great game though, would be 5 *\'s if it weren\'t for soooo many adds.
reviews.author: Josh Marmont

reviews.comment: Just got it. The famous autos attracted me. With they would include Knight 2000 and the General Lee\tThe famous cars attracted me. Wish they would include the Knight 2000 and the General Lee

reviews.title: Cars and guns 3D free
reviews.comment: Wow I am so scared of the zombies which is so fake.
reviews.author: Caleb Cross

reviews.title: Ad mania
reviews.comment: I didn\'t think it was possible to put this many ads in a game. I have been proven wrong.

reviews.title: Omg so good
reviews.comment: I love it its like im made of paper in my living room

reviews.title: Really nice game
reviews.comment: Really cool. I can\'t stop playing this game!

reviews.title: Fun. Lots of fun.
reviews.comment: Fun. Lots of fun.

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Its a great game and all. But the ads make it a 3 star game. Tip: get rid of the ads!

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Super game love it.. but running short of money..          Must download by everyone

reviews.title: Great concept and gameplay
reviews.comment: Game concept is original; controls are basic and physics could use some fine-tuning. Besides that the game is excellent.
